document.full_text: charl schwartzel's stunning victory in the masters generated a 10.4 preliminary overnight nielsen rating sunday on cbs ' down from a 12.0 last year, when phil mickelson won and tiger woods returned to competitive golf.
document.title: sports briefing | golf: masters ratings slip
lines_and_colors: charl schwartzel's stunning victory in the masters generated a 10.4 preliminary overnight nielsen rating sunday on cbs ' down from a 12.0 last year, when phil mickelson won and tiger woods returned to competitive golf.
